syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of Composite Culture > The dress, manners, social amenities and festivals which the Mughals introduced in India, were accepted by the people in India

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of Composite Culture > The trend towards fusion of two cultures is best seen in the field of music.

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of Composite Culture > During the reign of Akbar, there was a fusion of Persian and Indian style of painting.

syllabus_leaves.title: During the reign of Akbar, there was a fusion of Persian and Indian style of painting.

syllabus_leaves.path: Impact of Composite Culture > In the field of architecture, the Indian and Islamic systems of art were mingled to give rise to a new type of Indo-Islamic architecture.
